48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas bin Mallik [may Allah be pleased with him] narrates, saying:“I used to often hear the Prophet (ﷺ) supplicating with these words: ‘O Allah, I seek refuge in You from sadness, grief, helplessness, laziness, being stingy, overwhelming debt, and the overpowering of men (Allāhumma innī a`ūdhu bika minal-hammi wal-ḥazani wal-`ajzi wal-kasali wal-bukhli wa ḍala`id-dain wa ghalabatir-rijāl).’”

chapter.eng-name: The Supplication: “O Allah, I Seek Refuge In You From Sadness And Grief”
